sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Putin spokesman has accused Washington of masterminding the alleged Kremlin drone attack, saying it was targeting the Russian president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: In The Hague, Volodymyr Zelensky's plea is that Russian aggression against Ukraine should be subject to full-scale justice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Viktor Orban takes aim at what he calls progressive liberals, as Hungary hosts an American-style right-wing conference.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin has accused the US of masterminding yesterday's alleged drone attack, which it claims directly targeted President Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: claims directly targeted President Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's denied any involvement, and Washington has suggested it may have been staged to justify a military escalation of its invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Putin's spokesman, Dmitry Peskov, dismissed the denials as totally ridiculous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: He said in response, Russia would take what he called thoughtful, balanced steps in line with the interests of our country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The EU's foreign policy chief suggested the apparent attack could lead to a further mobilisation of Russian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: We call Russia not to use this alleged attack as an excuse to continue the escalation of the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: This is what worries us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: What worries us is this can be used in order to justify more conscription of people, soldiers, more attacks to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: A Russian oil refinery closer to the border was also hit by suspected drones and in Ukraine there were strikes on Kyiv and Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Fears over further drone assaults have led some Russian mayors to cancel forthcoming May 9th victory parades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Spotted, high in the sky above Kiev, a drone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The sound of air defence guns, screams from bystanders, then cheers as the automated bomber was shot down.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: A moment of celebration for young people who've lived for more than a year under the threat of Russian bombardment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Falling debris caused a fire in the Solomensky district.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: For the residents of Ukraine's capital, mobile phone memories of one small victory, but a victory that was to be short-lived.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian authorities later confirmed the drone was one of their own, shot down because it was malfunctioning and a threat to the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: On an unscheduled visit to the Hague's International Criminal Court, Volodymyr Zelensky made an unequivocal plea to the international community to ensure a tribunal tries the crime of Russian aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's the strength of freedom and of law which must work to the full of insured justice, not hybrid promises instead of human rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Real freedom, not hybrid impunity and symbolic formalities, but full-scale justice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: And in the meantime, clarification of NATO's role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But anyway, we are realistic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We know that we will not be in NATO during the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But during the war we want to get a very clear message that we will be in NATO after the war we want to get a very clear message that we will be in NATO after the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia cannot win this war and it must be held accountable for all the crimes of aggression and the injustice it is inflicting on the people of Ukraine day after day in this horrific war.

sentences.sentence: The presidential convoy left the court, its message safely delivered that Ukraine must see justice and freedom in the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The European Central Bank has once again increased the cost of borrowing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: once again increased the cost of borrowing. The institution in charge of maintaining price stability in the euro area has decided to continue applying the medicine to combat an invisible disease that's eating away at the pockets of millions of Europeans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The inflation outlook continues to be too high and for too long. In light of the ongoing high inflation pressures, the Governing Council today decided to raise the three key ECB interest rates by 25 basis points.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: A quarter of a point that raises interest rates to 3.75%, with the purpose of curbing annual inflation, which in April rose again to stand at 7%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The stated inflation objective of the European Central Bank is 2%, so new rate hikes could be in the offing in the not-too-distant future.

sentences.sentence: The number of Ukrainian companies in the Polish market has increased to 25,000. Wielu firm ukraińskich w polskim rynku wzrosło do 25 tys. Ten wielki wzrost jest powodowany przez wzrost refugi z Ukrainy od 24 listopada 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Like Irina, a bookkeeper who came to Poland after February 24 without knowing the language. I am very happy that I got into the company that was opened by our Ukrainian businessmen.
